page_text:
Sunny the sunflower, with petals so bright, 
Joined Luna and Rose with pure delight. 
"Why did the sun go to school?" Sunny asked with glee, 
"To get a little brighter, you see!" 

Laughter danced through the garden so wide, 
As Sunny, Luna, and Rose laughed side by side.
text_placement_suggestion: bottom of the page, beneath the illustration of the three characters
